FuncDef:
The delete hop command deletes a specified node from the MPLS TE explicit path.
The delete sid label index command deletes a specified label hop from an SR-MPLS TE explicit path.
The delete index command deletes a specified index from the MPLS TE explicit path.

ParaDef.Info:
IP address.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Label value.
The value is an integer ranging from 16 to 1048575.

Index value.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 96.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Ensure that no tunnel interface on the local node is using an explicit path before running the delete hop command to delete specified node from the explicit path.
